评论详情: I love this skirt!! It fits and flatters in all the right places! Very good but!!

The reviews here all seem to focus on the fit and the appearance. Both of those are fantastic, I’ll agree. But after only wearing it a few times, the stitching started coming undone. It’s pretty poor quality. Got as a gift and got to wear it maybe 3 times.

I was really pleased with this skirt. I bought it for a trip that would be hot and humid. It was perfect. However they did show that this could also be used a dress. I found that to be a bit awkward since the ties were in a weird spot and leaving them hanging seemed weird to me. So I just used it as a skirt. I think the item was as expected. I am happy with the purchase.
Love the colors, love the fit. I will be purchasing a couple more. Light and flowy
La pollera sirve para un par de posturas pero queda muy bien y la relación con el precio es justa.

When you get a skirt like this it's so hard to tell what it really is going to look like on. Let's face it, not all of us have a model's body right?  But the waist is elastic all the way around so it fits very well all the way around, it's the perfect length, and the colors are exact. So for a plus-size person, it fits great all the way to the floor!
It’s ok, I love the design but the fit is just ok.  Not the most flattering
This skirt is so cute and comfortable. I like that it has a built in lining.
So comfortable and very pretty on. I get compliments every time I wear it!
Great skirt
Love this bohemian skirt!  Bought another one in a different color!

I absolutely love this skirt. It’s the second one I have bought and it fits so nice and comfortably. It’s just plain fun to wear. When I get enough money I’m going to buy a third one.  It’s very well made.  And I love the fact that it is made by artisan tailors in Thailand. They are able to work in a safe environment and earn decent wages. I’m glad to be a part of this.
This skirt that turns into a sundress is perfect,  it's lite weight and easy to pack for any trip. Dress it up or go casual.

评论概述: Great concept, not for easy travel
评论详情: Saw this skirt on several influencer sites as perfect for travel.  In concept, can be worn multiple ways as both skirt and dress.  As a skirt, it does work well as Midi and long.  For a dress, the ties aren't in a place that worked well to convert to a dress and ties (halter or thin strap).  I could only get it to a strapless look that didn't look or lay awkward.Nice flow to skirt.  Material makes it so it could be dressed up or down.The showstopper that led me to return - the wrinkles!  I look for no wrinkles or ones that would easily fall out with steamy bathroom for travel capsule.

This dress/skirt is so versatile! I wore it as a dress with a sticky bra and it was so comfortable. If worn as a skirt, you may have to roll the upper portion of you're vertically challenged, but it looks totally fine and is comfortable. I got the black and tan variant, no issues with it being see through or anything. Definitely worth the value, holds up well in the washing machine. The material is a bit thinner but it makes this a desirable choice for hot summers!
Super comfortable, I got so many compliments. Definitely ordering more.
Cute but ripped after the first wear :(
Soft and flowingi i Wasn't impressed at first sight. I wore it anyway and got numerous compliments..it's a keeper!
The fit was perfect, and everyone complemented me on the vivid, cool pattern. I even bought a second but different skirt!
Love these skirts, very flattering. I bought 2 about 1 year ago, and I used a crop top that just met the skirt. Many people love the bohemian style that can be dressed down or up

I bought this on a whim and I really enjoy wearing it. I use it over my bathing suit when we were in Hawaii. It fits well. I don’t like that. I have to hand wash and it does lose its color when you do that..
True to size and so cute!

Not in a long time have I had to worry about colors bleeding.  As recommended I did a delicate rinse before wearing. I was stupid and added other items to the rinse.  This skirt bled blue on everything and when I contacted Amazon they did nothing about it.  The skirt was pretty but after an actual wash I’m pretty sure the skirt will have no color left or look pretty faded.  Bad quality and service
Fabric is nice and flowing. Great color and style.
Sizes great. I love the versatility that I can wear it as a dress or a skirt. It's lightweight and comfortable.. I want more and more colors.

评论概述: Love this skirt but colors bleeds, be careful
评论详情: I love the fit of this skirts, I have 2 colors now. Both bleed color badly. The only fault of this skirt, I have to hand wash and hand dry. I have washed both many times and color is still bleeding. I have the red and purple but beware that all colors probably run. Do not wash with your regular laundry!  Other than that, the skier fits nicely and I also wear as a strapless dress too. The elastic gahter works well at hips or bust.
This skirt is so cute and fits perfect.  I love the different color it can be purchased in.  I plan on buying a couple more. The price is great.
Love this Maxi Skirt so happy with purchase. There are so many choices that I am sure I will be ordering another one.
Am going to Greece in SEPT and wanted an airy  skirt to visit the monasteries and this skirt is very comfy and light! True to size  and vibrant colors!! Santorini here I come!!

I recently ordered this skirt and was very disappointed when relieved. Material is thin and cheap feeling. It also does not lay the way the photo shows and does not look like a wrap skirt. Colors are bright and cheerful but we shall see after it has been washed a few times.

This skirt is pretty, but also see through, so if you’re wearing panties everyone will be able to see them. I returned it for this reason.
This skirt is a beautiful addition to my summer wardrobe. Hangs very nicely and fits well. Excellent value.

Love the material, flowy and fun!! The material in the middle is a bit long, stepped on it sometimes. The waist is scrunggy and comfortable for the bigger waistlines. I hear it can be worn also as sleeveless tank dress.
Absolutely love the dress. The material is light and feels great in the hot Texas sun! Definitely recommend. Super comfy ❤️
I’ve worn this over and over!!! So nice for our hot humid days. I wear as a halter dress & not straps at all. Most definitely would recommend!
So comfortable. Fits great. Soft cool material. Bought more of these. I want to live in these skirts daily!!!
Love the design on this skirt.  Very comfortable.

I absolutely love this dress/skirt. It’s very high quality fabric and so wonderful for hot climates. It offers multiple functionalities, you can wear as a skirt with a tank top/shirt or as a calf length dress. I’ve purchased multiple colors and will probably buy them all. I love this dress for summer!
Excellent ,light, easy to wash, very comfortable,  love  color,

I got this in blue and it’s pretty light weight, so great for the summers, does not irritate my skin,  and is not transparent. Most of all, I love that you can wear it as a long skirt or a dress, so it’s a two-fer! 😊
It is thin and lightweight. But the fabric came damaged. And the tie pieces are not as shown in the photos so I can turn this into a midi dress as shown.

This is such a bargain. I'm about to order like 4 more for myself. The fabric is a nice, heavier rayon with a saturated design. The dress is cool and comfortable and I got several compliments while wearing it today. 20 bucks for a skirt and dress? Yes. Absolutely. I'm on board fully. I'm so used to being disappointed with the clothing I get on Amazon that I'm totally dumbfounded over this find.
This is very beautiful!! The fabric is comfortable and even received a quality care email after it arrived; would recommend this to everyone!!!

I’m not a big shorts wearing person until my legs get tan! But it gets so hot! The hubs recommended some skirts so I gave  a few a try…this one is AWESOME!!! Love it! Love wearing it! Would definitely order again/more. The elastic waist was loose and comfortable, but not too loose! The lightness of the fabric was super comfortable even in steamy hot of Florida beaches! If you order lighter color it might be too transparent, but it wasn’t for the color I ordered!
Perfect length and fit! Beautiful pattern and great fabric quality (very light and flowy). Favoriteo for summer!

评论概述: Beautiful but runs a bit large
评论详情: This was definitely beautiful and can wear as dress easily but felt was too big so returned and will order the smaller size
You can wear in different styles

I love the light material,  the length and style! The light compression on the waist is comfortable and is ideal and being able to adjust how high or how low I want the waist line. Plus it turns into a full mid length dress for a second outfit. Happy with purchase!
I am absolutely in love with the colors, flow and fit of this very boho skirt! I can’t wait to wear it a a dress too!
It looks really nice!
I want another one! Looks cute as a dress or skirt. Lots of compliments - I ordered the red in medium and it fit perfectly.

This skirt is just okay. It fit nicely and has a pretty pattern and flow/movement. However, it's very thin, to the point you can see light through it (I ordered black with the mandala pattern), to the point that I felt a bit self conscious in public. Also, I wore and washed it ONCE (on cold, delicate cycle), and the fabric already appears faded and pilled. Would not recommend, overall.

What I loved and have no complaints about anything from about this skirt, is the brightness of the colors it washed well and I'm very pleased thank you so much! Already shared this link with my neighbor she liked the skirt 😃
Love the colors, nice fabric. Very flown. Just the boho look I wanted.
Skirt fell apart after 1 wash

I love these skirts, I have 3 of them! They are so stylish and the stretch waist/hip area is so comfortable. They are a bit sheer, but I wear them at night to dinner when we're on vacation with a bodysuit. They are small to pack. I only dry-clean them, and they've lasted several years and many vacations.
Needed a lightweight, pretty skirt for traveling. This skirt was perfect. I am 5'4", 120 pounds and bought a size small. Fit perfectly.
Love this! Be sure to wrap/tie across front because that confused me for a sec out of the package but I LOVE this and will probably buy more!

I just got a few of these skirt/dresses and I would put them in my top 5 of great finds on Amazon! I’m 5’1” and 135lbs, 32D. I hate wearing a bra. I bought some tanks with sewn in bra cups and they go perfectly with these as skirts. But the dress options! First, the stretchy ruched “top” of the dress is a great length hitting just above my pouch of a tummy then flowing into the skirt. The ties can be tied in front or back for a cute strapless look, up and behind the neck as shown in images, crossed in front behind neck. It’s thin but quality cotton fabric. The stitching at the bottom is pretty simple and I do foresee it fraying if you drag it on the ground. The darker colors are not see through (you can see shapes if a light is behind you, but not the color or coverage of panties). I can’t speak on the lighter colors. It’s breezy and breathable. I’ve found my summer uniform! I do wish they had some more “modern” patterns but I’m ok looking like a boho hippy.
This skirt is light and airy. Love the style and that you can wear it two ways. Perfect summer skirt. True to size. The one downside is that I had to iron it.

评论概述: Really pretty pattern but low quality
评论详情: I adore the pattern and colors of this skirt; however, the quality is disappointing considering the price. The material is extremely thin, even more so than similar skirts I've purchased from other vendors at a lower cost. The fabric feels cheap and is transparent. The stitching is poor, with numerous loose threads. Additionally, it arrived without a label, leaving me uncertain if it's new or used. In contrast, other vendors provide labeled skirts with superior fabric quality that is also thicker yet remains lightweight and flowing. I'm hesitant to recommend this product, despite its attractiveness.  3 stars for the color and style.

评论概述: A little long as a skirt if petite
评论详情: I ordered this skirt and love the pattern. The colors are just as described and it is nice and flowy. I am short and the length is a little long but likely wouldn’t be an issue for someone over 5’2”.

I love the look of the skirt and how nicely it drapes. Got compliments on how nice it looks on me and I’m an apple body. The material feels a bit scratchy. Haven’t washed it, but I intend to hand wash and hang to dry. It would make a great travel skirt.
Love the color and feel. Fits well

评论概述: I now own 4 different colors - they are perfect for me
评论详情: Love the light and airy fabric, these skirts are casual type but can be upgraded with the right blouse and shoes.  For me I wear them with a slip  or leggings unless I am at the beach.

I absolutely loved this skirt, but it got a hole in it the second time I wore it. I sewed it, but by the third time I wore it, the seems started coming out. It fits perfectly, and it’s beautiful. I just wished it was more durable.
I get so many compliments on this.  It is as advertised and a beautiful comfy design.

I have one of these from a different seller from about 2 years ago - it's the BEST! So, I thought I'd "re-order" in a different color.  My other dress is a light rayon type fabric, flowy and gorgeous.  This one is  almost crinkly, plastic feeling, absolutely TERRIBLE.  It's itchy and uncomfortable, just terribly cheap looking and feeling.In addition, as another reviewer pointed out the pattern is obviously inappropriate when worn as a dress - unless you'd like to have bullseyes on your chest.Love the concept... the execution for this vendor is dreadful.  I wish I could still get one from my previous vendor.  AND, I'm well past my date for return otherwise I'd be sending this back.
I’ve worn this a couple times & received tons of compliments!  Easy to clean & cool material

There was a bit of an issue with a hanging thread and piece of fabric that I cut off. It's a little tight on me because I got the small medium. I guess you can be hippy and get the larger size and still be good. This will be tight around my chest if I use it as a dress which is great though.
On time
I was wearing it as a skirt and pairing it with a crop top until I learned to cross the straps behind my neck to make it a dress. Very pretty. Nice fabric. I’ve been wearing it non-stop.

I actually hardly ever write reviews, but this item is worth sharing. Just like so many other reviewers, I love this skirt! I really like the extra tie on the front, as it hides the belly a bit more than other similar styl., The tie is also a nice decorative element. The colors are exactly as it looks in the photo. Material seems decent for “fast fashion”. I have not washed it, but I’ll probably hand wash in cold to be safe. It’s a great weight for Spring through Fall. It’s easily light enough for Summer, and you could probably be fine with leggings or tights under for winter. I’m 5’6” and wearing it as a skirt it just about hits the floor on me, which is what I wanted! It’s easy to dress up for dinner or dress down for running around! So many wins in my opinion! Just give it a try….and you will see!
Fits nicely and colors are beautiful!

评论用户: Fit true to size and are great quality!

评论详情: Thin material, the top with the bow is very cute but very tight. I ended up returning the item. I ordered the large and it was hard to get over my butt.

Fabric and vibrancy of the colors is absolutely beautiful! As I inspect everything upon arrival from Amazon it appears to be a good quality. The fabric is very lightweight and will be great for the hot summer days and nights. I love the fact that it can be worn as a skirt and a dress. Will definitely buy another!
Received many compliments
I really like the way the fabric feels. Very soft and light!

Not gonna lie, I may just love it cuz I got so many compliments on my ensemble but this skirt really did the heavy lifting. Other reviewers stated that it can emphasize if you have a belly. I definitely do and it definitely did not hide it well. But who cares with this gorgeous colors? Do NOT wash this with anything else as it will run. The water looked like blood but the skirt came out of the handwashing looking beautiful. Solid material. I felt very elegant.
It’s comfortable, light and versatile! Can’t wait to take to the beach!
They don't tell you what material it is, so I'm here to tell you it's rayon.  Do not buy this product.

I bought this skirt/dress for a recent trip to Fiji.  I wore it to the traditional Fijian night at the resort and it was a great hit.  So lightweight, flowing and comfortable to wear.  I wore it as a skirt and then also wore it as a dress.  Love, love, love this!
The picture did a get job of showing the skirt. I bought this for my wife and she loves it

I ordered 2 of these skirts… beautiful colors and I like the fact that they can be worn as a skirt or as a dress.. what I don’t like and why I took stars off my review is that the hem is not even, not even close to being even. One area came to just below my knee… another part was past my ankle and everything in between. Maybe this is supposed to be the beauty of it, but I am way too picky to let it go. They are beautiful and flowy just not even.

评论概述: Well, if the print wasn’t inappropriate…
评论详情: Comfortable, lightweight, nice fit, versatile (looked lovely as a skirt or dress, would make a great beach coverup)…BUT OH NO! It came with breasts printed straight onto the dress in a very anatomically correct place! I’ve ordered another color, and hopefully it comes as pictured and less absurdly inappropriate than the first one. I’ve included a photo of what it was supposed to look like, and of course, a photo of what I actually received. At least it has been the source of much laughter???
I absolutely love this skirt. I purchased various colors. Everyone compliments it, even strangers in stores and street. Super light, easy to iron and pretty. Very good quality and price.

It's comfy and just stands out with it's colorful print.  I am short, and it is floor length but does not need to be hemmed.  And the sellers made a point of reaching out with cleaning instructions, which was awesome.

I wore this to work, and one of my residents informed me that my butt was hanging out and I saw that there was a 6 inch long, at least separation in the same on the hip. I had to go to Walmart in the middle of my workday to get something else to wear.

评论详情: It fits fine. I ordered medium. I'm usually a size 6, 36D.  But it is a pink color and not sand which should be more beige.
